lines.name: Dyadian Dawn

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: +(70-85) to maximum Life
+(20-40)% to Fire Resistance
+(20-46)% to Cold Resistance
(1-1.2)% of Attack Damage Leeched as Life against Chilled Enemies
Ignites you inflict with Attacks deal Damage (35-42)% faster
Deal no Physical Damage

lines.flavourText:
With her cold resolve
And burning sacrifice
The Eternal twins arose.

lines.name: Death Rush

explicitModifiers.text: Recover (3-5)% of Life on Kill
Gain Adrenaline for (2-3) seconds on Kill
Gain Adrenaline for 1 second on Kill

lines.flavourText: To truly appreciate life you must be there when it ends

lines.name: Profane Proxy

explicitModifiers.text: +3 to Level of Socketed Curse Gems
+(20-36)% to Cold Resistance
+(20-36)% to Lightning Resistance
Left Ring Slot: Your Chilling Skitterbot's Aura applies Socketed Hex Curse instead
Right Ring Slot: Your Shocking Skitterbot's Aura applies Socketed Hex Curse instead

lines.flavourText: The machines do not hate. They merely serve one who does.

lines.name: Hyrri's Truth

explicitModifiers.text: Grants Level 30 Precision Skill
+(40-96) to Dexterity
+(25-60)% to Global Critical Strike Multiplier
Bow Attacks have Culling Strike
Precision has 100% increased Mana Reservation Efficiency

lines.flavourText: Strike true, strike hard, and leave no survivors to retaliate.

lines.name: Replica Dragonfang's Flight

lines.flavourText:
"Did we make this? Why do we have no record of it?
We were warned that there would be consequences..."
- Administrator Qotra

lines.name: The Taming

explicitModifiers.text: 20% increased Damage with Hits and Ailments per Freeze, Shock or Ignite on Enemy
+(20-36)% to all Elemental Resistances
(30-36)% increased Elemental Damage
10% chance to Freeze, Shock and Ignite
(30-36)% increased Elemental Damage with Attack Skills

lines.flavourText:
"Moon after moon did Berek make fools
Of the great and Untamed Three
Until malice for a Brother
Slew the hatred of the Other
And Berek did hunt
Alone and free."
- Berek and the Untamed

lines.name: Ming's Heart

explicitModifiers.text: 25% reduced maximum Energy Shield
25% reduced maximum Life
+(40-50)% to Chaos Resistance
Gain (40-72)% of Physical Damage as Extra Chaos Damage

lines.flavourText:
Ming slew Tranquillity
Took Chaos for his wife
And on Her immortal finger
He placed his Heart

lines.name: The Magnate

explicitModifiers.text: +(40-60) to Strength
+(20-25)% to all Elemental Resistances
50% increased Flask Charges gained
10% chance to deal Double Damage while you have at least 200 Strength
5% chance to deal Triple Damage while you have at least 400 Strength

lines.flavourText:
Few men cast a longer shadow
 than the Great Meginord of the North.

lines.name: Ryslatha's Coil

explicitModifiers.text: +(20-40) to Strength
(30-48)% more Maximum Physical Attack Damage
(30-48)% less Minimum Physical Attack Damage
Adds 1 to (15-24) Physical Damage to Attacks
+(80-100) to maximum Life
Gain 50 Life when you Stun an Enemy

lines.flavourText:
All creatures have the potential for greatness
or unequivocal failure.

lines.name: Astramentis

explicitModifiers.text: +(80-120) to all Attributes
-4 Physical Damage taken from Attack Hits

lines.flavourText:
Mindless rage will shake the world,
Cunning lies will bend it.
Reckless haste will break the world,
And into darkness send it.

lines.name: Atziri's Foible

explicitModifiers.text: +(100-120) to maximum Mana
(16-28)% increased maximum Mana
(80-120)% increased Mana Regeneration Rate
Items and Gems have 25% reduced Attribute Requirements

lines.flavourText:
The world is but a piece of parchment, blank and symmetric. 
We label each side: one Good, one Evil; one Black, one White. 
The divine truth, however, is that both are one and the same. 
-Jaetai, Vaal Advisor

lines.name: Sunblast

explicitModifiers.text: +(20-33)% to Fire Resistance
(50-75)% reduced Trap Duration
25% increased Light Radius
Skills which Throw Traps throw up to 2 additional Traps
Traps cannot be triggered by Enemies
Traps from Skills are thrown randomly around targeted location

lines.flavourText:
The sun's fury, trapped
in pillars of blazing light,
Explodes from its cage.

lines.name: The Jinxed Juju

explicitModifiers.text: +(30-48) to Intelligence
+(23-31)% to Chaos Resistance
(10-15)% increased effect of Non-Curse Auras from your Skills
10% of Damage from Hits is taken from your Spectres' Life before you

lines.name: Berek's Respite

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (20-25) to (30-50) Fire Damage to Spells and Attacks
(25-30)% increased Lightning Damage
+(30-40) to maximum Mana
When you Kill a Shocked Enemy, inflict an equivalent Shock on each nearby Enemy
When you Kill an Ignited Enemy, inflict an equivalent Ignite on each nearby Enemy

lines.flavourText:
"With Flame licking at his heels
Berek berated the clouds
Until vengeful Storm spewed forth his rains
And Berek held on tight
As Fire screamed and steamed
And fled."
- Berek and the Untamed

lines.name: Tavukai

explicitModifiers.text: +(30-40) to Intelligence
Minions have +(-17-17)% to Chaos Resistance
Summon Raging Spirit has (20-30)% increased Duration
Summoned Raging Spirits deal (25-40)% increased Damage
Summoned Raging Spirits have (25-40)% increased maximum Life
Summoned Raging Spirits take (20-24)% of their Maximum Life per second as Chaos Damage

lines.flavourText:
"Hyrri and her arrows broke the sacred code, damning herself. 
Kaom seized her sacrifice, and in doing so, seized victory." 
- Lavianga, Advisor to Kaom

lines.name: The Untouched Soul

explicitModifiers.text: +(40-48) to maximum Life for each Empty Red Socket on any Equipped Item
+225 to Accuracy Rating for each Empty Green Socket on any Equipped Item
+(40-48) to maximum Mana for each Empty Blue Socket on any Equipped Item
+18% to all Elemental Resistances for each Empty White Socket on any Equipped Item

lines.flavourText:
Geomancy offered a safer way to use the Tears...
but most Maji rejected that temptation as well.

lines.name: Redblade Band

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Golem Skills have 25% chance to Taunt on Hit
Socketed Golem Skills have Minions Regenerate 5% of Life per second
+3 to Level of Socketed Golem Gems
+(30-40) to Strength
(20-30)% increased Fire Damage
+(30-40) to maximum Life

lines.flavourText:
To ascend to leadership, the child of a Redblade warlord
must pull the band from the still-hot
ashes of their father.

lines.name: Fury Valve

explicitModifiers.text: (15-25)% increased Evasion Rating
+(15-20)% to all Elemental Resistances
Skills fire 2 additional Projectiles
(20-30)% increased Projectile Speed

Modifiers to number of Projectiles instead apply
to the number of targets Projectiles Split towards

lines.flavourText: A single act of anger travels countless paths of destruction.

lines.name: Bisco's Leash

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: 5% increased Quantity of Items found
+(20-40)% to Cold Resistance
1% increased Rarity of Items found per 15 Rampage Kills
Rampage

lines.flavourText:
You were always there, by my side,
whether we sat or played.
Our friendship was a joyful ride,
I wish you could have stayed.

lines.name: The Pariah

explicitModifiers.text: +2 to Level of Socketed Gems
(5-12)% increased Attack and Cast Speed
+100 to Maximum Life per Red Socket
+100 to Maximum Mana per Green Socket
+100 to Maximum Energy Shield per Blue Socket
15% increased Item Quantity per White Socket

lines.flavourText:
A man who changes his loyalties often,
soon finds he has none.

lines.name: Leash of Oblation

explicitModifiers.text: +(15-24) to all Attributes
+(50-80) to maximum Life
You can have an Offering of each type
Offering Skills have 50% reduced Duration

lines.flavourText: Those who offer up sacrifices to every deity entreat the full favour of none.

lines.name: Willowgift

explicitModifiers.text: 10% reduced Strength
15% increased Dexterity
-(30-20)% to Fire Resistance
+(30-40)% to Cold Resistance
You do not inherently take less Damage for having Fortification
+4% chance to Suppress Spell Damage per Fortification
(15-25)% increased Attack and Cast Speed while at maximum Fortification

lines.flavourText: The storm cannot break that which bends.

lines.name: Call of the Brotherhood

explicitModifiers.text: +(15-28) to Intelligence
(15-30)% increased Lightning Damage
(30-40)% increased Mana Regeneration Rate
(40-48)% of Lightning Damage Converted to Cold Damage
Your spells have 100% chance to Shock against Frozen Enemies

lines.flavourText:
Forged by three brothers
so that they may recognize each other
across any distance of time or travel.

lines.name: Perquil's Toe

explicitModifiers.text: +(40-50) to Dexterity
(5-8)% increased Movement Speed
Lightning Damage of Enemies Hitting you is Lucky
Nearby Allies' Damage with Hits is Lucky

lines.flavourText: He was a lot luckier before he lost this.

lines.name: Dream Fragments

explicitModifiers.text: (20-24)% increased maximum Mana
(50-60)% increased Mana Regeneration Rate
+(30-40)% to Cold Resistance
Cannot be Chilled
Cannot be Frozen

lines.flavourText:
Doryani stumbled into a realm of madness
And awoke its Master.

lines.name: The Retch

explicitModifiers.text: +(60-80) to maximum Life
+(30-40)% to Cold Resistance
0.4% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life
60% increased Flask Effect Duration
30% reduced Flask Charges gained during any Flask Effect
(200-240)% of Life Leech applies to Enemies as Chaos Damage
(15-18)% increased Movement Speed during any Flask Effect

lines.flavourText:
But the grain grew twisted and the water turned dark
and those who partook of Mother Gull's gift
birthed monsters that fed 
on the flesh of one another.

lines.name: Valako's Sign

explicitModifiers.text: 40% increased Damage with Hits against Shocked Enemies
20% increased Lightning Damage
+(20-40) to maximum Mana
1% of Damage Leeched as Life against Shocked Enemies
25% chance to Shock

lines.flavourText:
A gift from Valako,
appointing Kiloava as the Herald of War.
A title Kaom claimed when he ended Kiloava's bloodline.

lines.name: Belt of the Deceiver

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: (15-25)% increased Global Physical Damage
You take 30% reduced Extra Damage from Critical Strikes
+(30-40) to maximum Life
+(10-15)% to all Elemental Resistances
Nearby Enemies are Intimidated

lines.flavourText:
In battle, virtue matters not. 
Only victory.

lines.name: Immortal Flesh

explicitModifiers.text: +(75-120) to maximum Life
Regenerate (200-419.2) Life per second
Regenerate (8-12) Mana per second
-(25-15)% to all Elemental Resistances
-(50-40) Physical Damage taken from Attack Hits
40% increased Armour while not Ignited, Frozen or Shocked

lines.flavourText:
"She begged the Earth to spare her Son;
Out of love the Earth agreed.
To the other Elements she did not speak
And out of spite They plotted."
- Berek and the Untamed

lines.name: Kikazaru

explicitModifiers.text: +(10-16) to all Attributes
(20-40)% increased Mana Regeneration Rate
(60-72)% reduced Effect of Curses on you
Regenerate (3-3.6) Life per second per Level

lines.flavourText: Hear no evil.

lines.name: Marylene's Fallacy

explicitModifiers.text: +(80-120) to Accuracy Rating
+(210-288)% to Global Critical Strike Multiplier
+(80-100) to Evasion Rating
(10-15)% increased Light Radius
(40-48)% less Critical Strike Chance
Critical Strikes have Culling Strike

lines.flavourText:
"Marylene stroked the medallion at her breast 
before every duel and every cast of the die." 
- Victario, the People's Poet

lines.name: The Ascetic

explicitModifiers.text: (80-100)% increased Rarity of Items found with a Normal Item Equipped
(10-15)% increased Quantity of Items found with a Magic Item Equipped

lines.flavourText: Many things come to one who has nothing.

lines.name: Ventor's Gamble

explicitModifiers.text: +(1-72) to maximum Life
(1-10)% increased Quantity of Items found
(1-10)% reduced Quantity of Items found
(1-40)% increased Rarity of Items found
(1-40)% reduced Rarity of Items found
+(-25-60)% to Fire Resistance
+(-25-60)% to Cold Resistance
+(-30-60)% to Lightning Resistance

lines.flavourText:
In a blaze of glory,
An anomaly defying all odds
The "unkillable" beast met the divine
And Ventor met his latest trophy.

lines.name: Berek's Grip

explicitModifiers.text: (25-36)% increased Cold Damage
Adds 1 to (50-84) Lightning Damage to Spells and Attacks
+(30-40) to maximum Life
1% of Damage Leeched as Life against Shocked Enemies
1% of Damage Leeched as Energy Shield against Frozen Enemies

lines.flavourText:
"Berek hid from Storm's lightning wrath
In the embrace of oblivious Frost
Repelled by ice, blinded by blizzards
Storm raged in vain
While Berek slept."
- Berek and the Untamed

lines.name: Carnage Heart

explicitModifiers.text: +(20-48) to all Attributes
+(10-20)% to all Elemental Resistances
(1.2-2)% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life
50% increased total Recovery per second from Life Leech
(30-40)% increased Damage while Leeching
Extra gore

lines.flavourText:
Forged from the blood of countless wars, 
its thirst has only begun.

lines.name: Karui Ward

explicitModifiers.text: +(20-36) to Strength
+100 to Accuracy Rating
30% increased Projectile Speed
10% increased Movement Speed
30% increased Projectile Damage

lines.flavourText:
"Shoot first, ask no questions."
- Karui wisdom

lines.name: Le Heup of All

implicitModifiers.text: Adds 1 to 4 Physical Damage to Attacks

explicitModifiers.text: +(10-36) to all Attributes
(10-30)% increased Damage
(10-30)% increased Rarity of Items found
+(10-30)% to all Elemental Resistances

lines.flavourText:
Existence is infinite
A weave of the living and dead
Beyond the understanding
Of the many mortal threads

lines.name: Praxis

explicitModifiers.text: +(30-69) to maximum Mana
Regenerate (3-6.7) Mana per second
-(9-4) to Total Mana Cost of Skills
(8-9)% of Damage taken Recouped as Mana

lines.flavourText:
The Thaumaturgical masters of the Eternal Empire,
as unpredictable and varied as they were,
all understood one thing:
Free thinking leads to free action.

lines.name: Prismweave

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (14-19) to (30-38) Fire Damage to Attacks
Adds (10-12) to (24-31) Cold Damage to Attacks
Adds 1 to (60-75) Lightning Damage to Attacks
+(6-15)% to all Elemental Resistances
(30-36)% increased Elemental Damage with Attack Skills during any Flask Effect

lines.flavourText: Nothing is as vivid as the rage of battle

lines.name: Pyre

explicitModifiers.text: +(25-35)% to Fire Resistance
(60-96)% increased Burning Damage
(40-48)% of Cold Damage Converted to Fire Damage
10% increased Light Radius
Ignited Enemies Killed by your Hits are destroyed

lines.flavourText: Let winter come. It will only make my fire burn brighter.

lines.name: Rigwald's Crest

explicitModifiers.text: Trigger Level 10 Summon Spectral Wolf on Kill
(20-30)% increased Mana Regeneration Rate

lines.flavourText:
Within the heart of every man and woman
lies the soul of a ferocious beast.
If you cannot tame it, embrace it.

lines.name: Soulthirst

explicitModifiers.text: +(60-80) to maximum Life
+15% to all Elemental Resistances
(20-30)% increased Mana Recovery from Flasks
(20-30)% reduced Flask Effect Duration
Gain Soul Eater during any Flask Effect
Lose all Eaten Souls when you use a Flask

lines.flavourText:
"They say a draught of fine spirits will ward off
the elements and promote a longer, merrier life.
I have found this to be true on all counts." 
- Zerphi of the Vaal

lines.name: Thief's Torment

explicitModifiers.text: (10-16)% increased Quantity of Items found
Can't use other Rings
+(25-40)% to all Elemental Resistances
Gain (40-70) Life per Enemy Hit with Attacks
Gain (30-35) Mana per Enemy Hit with Attacks
50% reduced Effect of Curses on you

lines.flavourText:
The ring I stole,
My finger they took,
A shrouded mind,
Cut their curses short,
As I drained their spirit
And stole their soul.
A blessing is often a curse.

lines.name: Mark of Submission

explicitModifiers.text: Curse Enemies with Socketed Hex Curse Gem on Hit

lines.flavourText:
So great was the thaumaturgy of a bloodpriest's mark,
that sacrifices soon welcomed their death.

lines.name: Rashkaldor's Patience

explicitModifiers.text: +(40-80) to maximum Life
+(20-40) to maximum Mana
20% reduced Duration of Elemental Ailments on Enemies
Items and Gems have 10% increased Attribute Requirements
Always Freeze, Shock and Ignite

lines.flavourText: Fate's smile, man's ruin.

lines.name: Mutewind Seal

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Golem Skills have 20% increased Attack and Cast Speed
Gain Onslaught for 10 seconds when you Cast Socketed Golem Skill
+3 to Level of Socketed Golem Gems
Adds (5-10) to (11-15) Physical Damage to Attacks
(5-10)% increased Attack Speed
(3-5)% increased Movement Speed

lines.flavourText:
When a fallen leader's body is taken to the funeral peak,
those who seek power must ascend together.
One returns with the seal. 
The rest do not return at all.

lines.name: Emberwake

explicitModifiers.text: (30-48)% increased Fire Damage
(5-10)% increased Cast Speed
10% chance to Ignite
(40-48)% less Burning Damage
You can inflict an additional Ignite on an Enemy

lines.flavourText: Leave the world in flames behind you.

lines.name: Andvarius

explicitModifiers.text: +10 to Dexterity
(50-70)% increased Rarity of Items found
-20% to all Elemental Resistances

lines.flavourText: Danger is the price of wealth.

lines.name: Araku Tiki

explicitModifiers.text: +(150-250) to Evasion Rating while on Low Life
+(30-50) to maximum Life
+(20-30)% to Fire Resistance
Gain Elusive on reaching Low Life
You have Phasing while on Low Life

lines.flavourText:
It is said to make you invisible when the Great
Spirit comes to take you on your final journey.

lines.name: Ascent From Flesh

explicitModifiers.text: +300 to Evasion Rating
+(75-80) to maximum Energy Shield
+(10-15)% to all Elemental Resistances
You have Phasing if Energy Shield Recharge has started Recently
30% increased Evasion Rating while Phasing
10% increased Movement Speed while Phasing

lines.flavourText:
A single step forward
Snap free from the prison
Reborn into freedom eternal

lines.name: Bated Breath

explicitModifiers.text: +(15-25) to Intelligence
10% increased Damage
+(20-36) to maximum Energy Shield
(20-24)% increased maximum Energy Shield
(50-60)% increased Energy Shield Recharge Rate

lines.flavourText: At knifepoint, a moment's hesitation means death.

lines.name: Berek's Pass

explicitModifiers.text: (25-30)% increased Fire Damage
Adds (20-25) to (30-50) Cold Damage to Spells and Attacks
+(30-40) to maximum Energy Shield
30% increased Damage while Ignited
+5000 to Armour while Frozen

lines.flavourText:
"From Frost's ice-bound pass
Berek taunted and jeered
Until furious Flame scaled the mountain
Berek escaped through the thaw
And Frost's tortured moans."
- Berek and the Untamed

lines.name: Blackheart

implicitModifiers.text: Adds 1 to 4 Physical Damage to Attacks

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (10-15) to (20-25) Chaos Damage to Attacks
Regenerate (10-15) Life per second
10% chance to Cause Monsters to Flee

lines.flavourText: Fear is highly infectious.

lines.name: Blightwell

implicitModifiers.text: Grants Level 23 Purity of Fire Skill
Grants Level 23 Purity of Lightning Skill
Grants Level 23 Purity of Ice Skill
Grants Level 21 Purity of Elements Skill
0.5% of Fire Damage Leeched as Life
0.5% of Cold Damage Leeched as Life
0.5% of Lightning Damage Leeched as Life
You can apply an additional Curse
(20-24)% increased Elemental Damage with Attack Skills

explicitModifiers.text: +(20-30) to maximum Energy Shield
+(15-30)% to Fire Resistance
+(15-30)% to Lightning Resistance
50% slower start of Energy Shield Recharge during any Flask Effect
(150-200)% increased Energy Shield Recharge Rate during any Flask Effect

lines.flavourText:
Long ago, the ocean was a puddle where a golden fish dwelt,
who lit the ocean from within and kept the water fresh.
When the sky burned, the fish dived deep,
never to return, and the waters turned sour.

lines.name: Daresso's Salute

explicitModifiers.text: 50% reduced maximum Energy Shield
+(30-40)% to Fire Resistance
+(30-40)% to Cold Resistance
10% increased Movement Speed when on Full Life
+0.2 metres to Melee Strike Range
60% increased Melee Damage when on Full Life

lines.flavourText:
"A bit short in the arm, are you? 
Then you'll be short of a head soon enough."
- Daresso the Daring

lines.name: Doedre's Damning

explicitModifiers.text: +(5-20) to Intelligence
+(5-20)% to all Elemental Resistances
Gain (5-20) Mana per Enemy Killed
You can apply an additional Curse

lines.flavourText:
Where her mouth should have been
there was only a whirling, black void.

lines.name: Essence Worm

explicitModifiers.text: +2 to Level of Socketed Aura Gems

Socketed Gems have no Reservation
Your Blessing Skills are Disabled
80% reduced Reservation Efficiency of Skills

lines.flavourText:
"This thing is not a pet. It is a parasite that feeds on the very will of its host.
Like any part of nightmare, it has found a way to make its price... acceptable."
- Malachai the Soulless

lines.name: Extractor Mentis

explicitModifiers.text: +(30-50) to Strength
Recover 1% of Life on Kill
5% chance to grant Onslaught to nearby Enemies on Kill
5% chance to grant Chaotic Might to nearby Enemies on Kill
5% chance to grant Unholy Might to nearby Enemies on Kill
10% chance to gain Onslaught for 10 seconds on Kill
10% chance to gain Chaotic Might for 10 seconds on Kill
10% chance to gain Unholy Might for 10 seconds on Kill

lines.flavourText:
When slaughtered flesh falls silent,
the soul may yet scream on.

lines.name: Eye of Chayula

explicitModifiers.text: 20% reduced maximum Life
30% increased Rarity of Items found
Cannot be Stunned

lines.flavourText:
Never blinking, always watching.

<default>{This item can be transformed with a Blessing of Chayula}

lines.name: Faminebind

explicitModifiers.text: +(20-30)% to Cold Resistance
20% increased Projectile Damage
30% reduced Flask Charges gained
60% increased Flask Effect Duration
Deals 50 Chaos Damage per second to nearby Enemies

lines.flavourText:
After the Great Fire, the land lay barren
and our forefathers grew weak.
Mother Gull took pity on them
and gave them grain and water.

lines.name: Feastbind

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (5-6) to (10-12) Physical Damage to Attacks
+(20-40) to maximum Life
0.2% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life
50% increased Flask Charges gained during any Flask Effect
50% increased Mana Regeneration Rate during any Flask Effect

lines.flavourText:
Our forefathers danced and drank and ate their fill
and did not honour the First Ones for their gifts.
So the First Ones filled the sky with fire.

lines.name: Gifts from Above

explicitModifiers.text: Trigger Level 10 Consecrate when you deal a Critical Strike
(30-35)% increased Global Critical Strike Chance
(10-15)% increased Light Radius
Creates Consecrated Ground on Critical Strike
(40-50)% increased Rarity of Items Dropped by Enemies killed with a Critical Strike
50% increased Damage while on Consecrated Ground
+5% Chance to Block Attack Damage while on Consecrated Ground

lines.flavourText: God blesses those who bless themselves.

lines.name: Heartbound Loop

explicitModifiers.text: Regenerate (10-15) Life per second
(20-40)% increased Mana Regeneration Rate
Minions have 15% increased maximum Life
Minions have 10% increased Area of Effect
(350-420) Physical Damage taken on Minion Death

lines.flavourText:
When the axe finally fell, Seryl shared his pain,
and the last thought that flickered through his
fading mind was her broken, shattered scream.

lines.name: Hinekora's Sight

explicitModifiers.text: Prevent +3% of Suppressed Spell Damage
+(600-1198) to Accuracy Rating
+(600-1000) to Evasion Rating
Cannot be Blinded

lines.flavourText: Remember the past, anticipate the future.

lines.name: Kaom's Sign

explicitModifiers.text: Grants Level 10 Enduring Cry Skill
+(10-24) to Strength
+1 to Maximum Endurance Charges

lines.flavourText:
A token from the sea
A sign for Kaom
to lead his Karui to Wraeclast.

lines.name: Lori's Lantern

explicitModifiers.text: +10% to all Elemental Resistances
(6-8)% increased Movement Speed when on Low Life
31% increased Light Radius
+(20-25)% to Chaos Resistance when on Low Life
Damage of Enemies Hitting you is Unlucky while you are on Low Life

lines.flavourText:
By its light, Lori led her young charges to safety 
and bound up their wounds. 
Her sword arm was iron, yet her heart gentle 
and proof against hate.

lines.name: Malachai's Artifice

explicitModifiers.text: All Sockets are White
Socketed Gems have Elemental Equilibrium
-20% to all Elemental Resistances
+(75-100)% to Fire Resistance when Socketed with a Red Gem
+(75-100)% to Cold Resistance when Socketed with a Green Gem
+(75-100)% to Lightning Resistance when Socketed with a Blue Gem

lines.flavourText:
When the wind blows, 
Know which way to bend
and watch the others break.

lines.name: Maligaro's Restraint

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 1 to (30-50) Lightning Damage to Attacks
100% increased Shock Duration on you
Shocks you cause are reflected back to you
60% increased Damage while Shocked
15% increased Movement Speed while Shocked

lines.flavourText:
"Our genius will pave the way forward.
May all who are worthy be improved!"
- Inquisitor Maligaro

lines.name: Meginord's Girdle

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: +25 to Strength
Adds 10 to 20 Physical Damage to Attacks
10% increased maximum Life
+(10-20)% to Cold Resistance
25% increased Flask Life Recovery rate

lines.flavourText:
Kaom's strength was rivaled only by
the great Meginord of the north.

lines.name: Mokou's Embrace

explicitModifiers.text: +(25-40)% to Cold Resistance
(25-48)% increased Attack Speed while Ignited
(25-48)% increased Cast Speed while Ignited
+25% chance to be Ignited
All Damage Taken from Hits can Ignite you

lines.flavourText: Fire makes the perfect blossom in the endless night.

lines.name: Natural Hierarchy

implicitModifiers.text: Grants Level 21 Purity of Elements Skill
Grants Level 23 Purity of Ice Skill
Grants Level 23 Purity of Fire Skill
Grants Level 23 Purity of Lightning Skill
0.5% of Lightning Damage Leeched as Life
0.5% of Cold Damage Leeched as Life
0.5% of Fire Damage Leeched as Life
You can apply an additional Curse
(20-24)% increased Elemental Damage with Attack Skills

explicitModifiers.text: (10-15)% increased Global Physical Damage
(25-30)% increased Fire Damage
(20-25)% increased Cold Damage
(15-20)% increased Lightning Damage
(30-35)% increased Chaos Damage

lines.flavourText:
Just as the rat cowers before the dog
and the dog cowers before Man,
so too should we cower before the First Ones
and pray we never learn of what comes next.

lines.name: Ngamahu's Sign

explicitModifiers.text: +(15-25) to Strength
Adds (20-25) to (30-35) Fire Damage to Spells and Attacks
15% increased Ignite Duration on Enemies
10% chance to Ignite
Recover (20-30) Life when you Ignite an Enemy

lines.flavourText:
A gift from Ngamahu,
a sign to the Karui to spread like fire.
Given to Akoya, but inherited by Kaom with the swing of his axe.

lines.name: Perandus Blazon

explicitModifiers.text: +(20-36) to all Attributes
(6-8)% increased Quantity of Items found
+20% to Fire Resistance
20% increased Flask Effect Duration
-2 Physical Damage taken from Attack Hits

lines.flavourText:
A large enough debt turns even a friend
into an enemy, and the Perandus family
had more debtors than anyone.

lines.name: Romira's Banquet

explicitModifiers.text: +333 to Accuracy Rating
+(15-25)% to Global Critical Strike Multiplier
+(40-60) to maximum Mana
0.4% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Mana
Gain a Power Charge on Non-Critical Strike
Lose all Power Charges on Critical Strike

lines.flavourText:
The Empress gave Romira two sons
Born of his brother's seed
Romira threw her a banquet
A perfidious meal indeed.

lines.name: Shaper's Seed

explicitModifiers.text: (60-100)% increased Mana Regeneration Rate
Regenerate 4% of Life per second
Nearby Allies gain 4% of Life Regenerated per second
Nearby Allies gain 80% increased Mana Regeneration Rate

lines.flavourText: The first light to grow in the primordial darkness.

lines.name: Sibyl's Lament

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (8-15) to (20-28) Fire Damage to Attacks
(10-20)% reduced Rarity of Items found
Left ring slot: You and your Minions take 80% reduced Reflected Elemental Damage
Right ring slot: You and your Minions take 80% reduced Reflected Physical Damage
(20-30)% increased Elemental Damage with Attack Skills

lines.flavourText:
The portrait reflected his pain,
a pain that she could never see.

lines.name: Sidhebreath

explicitModifiers.text: +25% to Cold Resistance
Minions have (10-15)% increased maximum Life
Minions convert 50% of Physical Damage to Cold Damage
Minions deal (25-38) to (50-71) additional Cold Damage
Minions deal no Non-Cold Damage

lines.flavourText: The breath of life is yours to give.

lines.name: Stone of Lazhwar

explicitModifiers.text: (12-15)% Chance to Block Spell Damage
(15-20)% increased Cast Speed
+(40-70) to maximum Mana

lines.flavourText:
You are slow, foolish and ignorant.
I am not.

lines.name: Tasalio's Sign

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (7-10) to (15-21) Cold Damage to Spells and Attacks
+(200-300) to Evasion Rating
50% chance to Avoid being Chilled
10% chance to Freeze
Adds (40-48) to (60-72) Cold Damage against Chilled Enemies

lines.flavourText:
A gift from Tasalio, God of Water,
to the chieftain Rakiata.
Kaom took Rakiata's head and hand
so that his warriors' axes might rise and fall like the waves.

lines.name: Tear of Purity

explicitModifiers.text: Grants Level 10 Purity of Elements Skill
+(10-20) to all Attributes
+(20-40) to maximum Life
+(5-10)% to all Elemental Resistances

lines.flavourText:
A shimmering symbol of Purity, clear as water,
but I know better than most how quickly
Purity can succumb to Corruption.
How quickly water turns to blood.
- Victario, the People's Poet

lines.name: The Anvil

explicitModifiers.text: (10-15)% Chance to Block Attack Damage
10% reduced Attack Speed
10% reduced Cast Speed
+(400-500) to Armour
(34-48) Life gained when you Block
(18-24) Mana gained when you Block
+3% to maximum Chance to Block Attack Damage
Reflects 240 to 300 Physical Damage to Attackers on Block

lines.flavourText: Forge your Perseverance on the Anvil of Faith.

lines.name: The Aylardex

explicitModifiers.text: +(30-50) to maximum Life
+(50-70) to maximum Mana
+1 to Maximum Power Charges
10% increased Mana Regeneration Rate per Power Charge
(80-100)% increased Power Charge Duration
1% of Damage is taken from Mana before Life per Power Charge
40% reduced Critical Strike Chance per Power Charge

lines.flavourText:
Shackled fires dance about;
Might within from force without.

lines.name: The Ignomon

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (18-24) to (32-40) Fire Damage to Attacks
+(100-150) to Accuracy Rating
+(100-150) to Evasion Rating
+20% to Fire Resistance
20% increased Light Radius
Nearby Enemies are Blinded

lines.flavourText: The light that reveals is the glare that blinds.

lines.name: The Warden's Brand

implicitModifiers.text: Adds 1 to 4 Physical Damage to Attacks

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (5-18) to (25-60) Physical Damage to Attacks
(30-36)% reduced Attack Speed
15% chance to gain a Frenzy Charge when you Stun an Enemy

lines.flavourText:
"I don't always have a flame handy
when a fresh delinquent walks through our gates."
- Brutus, Warden of Axiom

lines.name: Timeclasp

explicitModifiers.text: (10-18)% increased Attack Speed
(10-18)% increased Cast Speed
(1-20)% increased Skill Effect Duration
(1-20)% reduced Skill Effect Duration
(6-12)% of Damage taken Recouped as Mana
(6-12)% of Damage taken Recouped as Life
Unaffected by Temporal Chains

lines.flavourText:
"To us mere mortals, time is slippery. 
I'm just evening things out." 
- Doryani, Queen's Thaumaturgist

lines.name: Umbilicus Immortalis

explicitModifiers.text: (8-14)% increased maximum Life
Regenerate (2-2.4)% of Life per second
Flasks do not apply to you
Flasks you Use apply to your Raised Zombies and Spectres

lines.flavourText:
"The power of rebirth rivals that of immortality."
- Icius Perandus, Antiquities Collection, Item 3

lines.name: Ungil's Harmony

explicitModifiers.text: (250-420)% increased Global Critical Strike Chance
+(30-50) to maximum Life
+(30-50) to maximum Mana
40% increased Stun and Block Recovery
Your Critical Strikes do not deal extra Damage

lines.flavourText: Gentle anger, raging calm.

lines.name: Valyrium

explicitModifiers.text: +(30-40) to maximum Energy Shield
+(30-40)% to Fire Resistance
-40% to Cold Resistance
Stun Threshold is based on Energy Shield instead of Life

lines.flavourText: They will rise and fall in fire and blood.

lines.name: Victario's Acuity

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: +(30-40)% to Lightning Resistance
+(8-10)% to Chaos Resistance
10% chance to gain a Frenzy Charge on Kill
10% chance to gain a Power Charge on Kill
5% increased Projectile Speed per Frenzy Charge
5% increased Projectile Damage per Power Charge

lines.flavourText:
"Grind your words into sharp thoughts.
Grind your thoughts into the sharpest of deeds."
- Victario, the People's Poet

lines.name: Voideye

explicitModifiers.text: +5 to Level of Socketed Gems

lines.flavourText: The darker the eye, the more diligent the watched.

lines.name: Warped Timepiece

explicitModifiers.text: (10-30)% increased Attack Speed
(10-28)% increased Cast Speed
(10-18)% increased Movement Speed
(10-20)% reduced Skill Effect Duration
Debuffs on you expire 100% faster

lines.flavourText:
As you have lived, so you shall die 
forever trying to keep up with me. 
Your blood on these hands of mine
forever makes me the public enemy.

lines.name: Winterheart

explicitModifiers.text: +(20-30) to Dexterity
+(50-70) to maximum Life
+75% to Cold Resistance
Cannot be Chilled
Regenerate 10% of Life per second while Frozen

lines.flavourText:
Those who dwell in the deep freeze
enjoy a special kind of madness.

lines.name: Wurm's Molt

explicitModifiers.text: +(20-30) to Strength
+(20-30) to Intelligence
+(17-30)% to Cold Resistance
(0.4-2)% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life
(0.4-2)% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Mana
(500-1000)% increased total Recovery per second from Life Leech
(500-1000)% increased total Recovery per second from Mana Leech

lines.flavourText:
They say a lifetime of wisdom is carried
in every skin the great beasts shed.

lines.name: Bisco's Collar

explicitModifiers.text: (100-150)% increased Rarity of Items Dropped by Slain Magic Enemies
(35-50)% increased Quantity of Items Dropped by Slain Normal Enemies

lines.flavourText:
Friendship worth its weight in gold,
a treasure every day.
I thought together we'd grow old,
until fate pulled you away.

lines.name: Soul Tether

explicitModifiers.text: +(20-40) to Intelligence
Gain (4-6)% of Maximum Life as Extra Maximum Energy Shield
Immortal Ambition

lines.flavourText:
Vaal bloodpriests were among the earliest intellectuals on record. 
It was they who found that a newly freed soul would 
desperately cling to any other source of life.

lines.name: Maligaro's Cruelty

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: (4-8)% increased maximum Life
(25-30)% chance to gain a Frenzy Charge on Killing an Enemy affected by at least 5 Poisons
(12-15)% chance to gain a Power Charge on Killing an Enemy affected by fewer than 5 Poisons
10% increased Damage with Poison per Frenzy Charge
3% increased Poison Duration per Power Charge

lines.flavourText:
"He does not love. He does not feel regret or remorse.
He does not think about consequences, only possibilities.
If that does not describe a monster, tell me: what does?"
- Archbishop Geofri

lines.name: Winterweave

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (12-16) to (25-30) Fire Damage to Attacks
Adds (12-17) to (25-30) Cold Damage to Attacks
+(20-40) to maximum Life
+(25-30)% to Cold Resistance
10% increased Movement Speed while Ignited
The Effect of Chill on you is reversed

lines.flavourText: Fury fuels defiance.

lines.name: Gluttony

explicitModifiers.text: +(60-80) to maximum Life
You have Culling Strike against Cursed Enemies
Gain (20-28) Life per Cursed Enemy Hit with Attacks
Gain (10-14) Mana per Cursed Enemy Hit with Attacks
Take (100-200) Physical Damage when you use a Movement Skill
You have no Armour or Maximum Energy Shield

lines.flavourText:
What started as a desire to feed
became a desire to learn...

lines.name: The Primordial Chain

explicitModifiers.text: +3 to maximum number of Summoned Golems
You cannot have non-Golem Minions
25% reduced Golem Size
Golems Deal (35-45)% less Damage
Golems have (35-45)% less Life
Golems have (80-100)% increased Movement Speed
Primordial

lines.flavourText:
The leash of the lifegiver
binds in both directions.

lines.name: Siegebreaker

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

(6-10)% increased maximum Life
+(17-23)% to Chaos Resistance
Minions have (5-6)% chance to Taunt on Hit with Attacks
Your Minions spread Caustic Ground on Death, dealing (20-23.2)% of their maximum Life as Chaos Damage per second

lines.flavourText: Poison the land and they'll have nothing to defend.

lines.name: Venopuncture

implicitModifiers.text: Adds 1 to 4 Physical Damage to Attacks

explicitModifiers.text: +(20-30) to Strength
Attacks have 25% chance to cause Bleeding
(40-60)% increased Damage with Bleeding
You are Chilled while you are Bleeding
Non-Chilled Enemies you inflict Bleeding on are Chilled
Bleeding Enemies you Kill with Hits Shatter

lines.flavourText:
There is a way to survive the bite of an ice snake,
but few have the resolve to attempt it.

lines.name: Icefang Orbit

implicitModifiers.text: Adds 1 to 4 Physical Damage to Attacks

explicitModifiers.text: +(20-30) to Dexterity
25% chance to Poison on Hit
(40-60)% increased Damage with Poison
You are Chilled when you are Poisoned
Non-Chilled Enemies you Poison are Chilled
Poisoned Enemies you Kill with Hits Shatter

lines.flavourText:
Those members of the Brotherhood who employ the venom of 
Trarthan ice snakes must take great care with the volatile substance.

lines.name: Mother's Embrace

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: +(50-70) to maximum Life
+(20-30)% to Cold Resistance
Your Minions use your Flasks when summoned
Minions have (25-40)% reduced Flask Charges used
Minions have (50-80)% increased Flask Effect Duration

lines.flavourText: Drink, my children, and be strengthened.

lines.name: Storm Secret

explicitModifiers.text: +(20-30) to Intelligence
(20-36)% increased Lightning Damage
(10-15)% chance to Shock
Herald of Thunder also creates a storm when you Shock an Enemy
Storms Hit Enemies with (30-50)% increased Frequency
Herald of Thunder's Storms Hit Enemies with (30-50)% increased Frequency
Take (250-300) Lightning Damage when Herald of Thunder Hits an Enemy

lines.flavourText: Lightning lives in an endless circle.

lines.name: Retaliation Charm

explicitModifiers.text: (10-20)% chance to Blind Enemies on Hit with Attacks
Blind does not affect your Light Radius
Blind you inflict is Reflected to you
(10-20)% chance to gain a Frenzy Charge on Hit while Blinded

lines.flavourText: An eye for an eye.

lines.name: Pyroshock Clasp

explicitModifiers.text: +(30-48) to Dexterity
+(300-500) to Evasion Rating
(10-15)% increased Duration of Elemental Ailments on Enemies
Enemies Ignited by you have (10-15)% of Physical Damage they deal converted to Fire
Enemies Shocked by you have (10-15)% of Physical Damage they deal converted to Lightning

lines.flavourText: Teach a man to burn, and you'll be warm for the rest of his life.

lines.name: The Highwayman

explicitModifiers.text: (15-25)% increased Rarity of Items found
1% of Damage Leeched as Life
(5-10)% increased Movement Speed
Steal Power, Frenzy, and Endurance Charges on Hit
Total Recovery per second from Life Leech is Doubled

lines.flavourText: Somebody does have to get hurt.

lines.name: The Druggery

explicitModifiers.text: +(20-30) to all Attributes
(15-25)% increased Flask Charges gained
(10-20)% increased Flask Charges used
(10-20)% increased Flask Effect Duration
Life Flasks gain 1 Charge every 3 seconds
100% of Life Recovery from Flasks is applied to nearby Allies instead of You

lines.flavourText:
"This will help with the pain.
One for you... and one for me."
- Doctor 'Shaky Hands' Opden

lines.name: Doedre's Tongue

explicitModifiers.text: +(20-25)% to all Elemental Resistances
(20-25)% chance to Freeze, Shock and Ignite
Cursed Enemies cannot inflict Elemental Ailments on You

lines.flavourText:
Maligaro did the cutting... at her request.
In the new void, a malevolent power emerged.

lines.name: Chain of Endurance

explicitModifiers.text: +(40-50) to maximum Life
(40-60)% increased Stun and Block Recovery
Reflects (100-150) Physical Damage to Melee Attackers
Regenerate 2% of Life per second for each different Ailment affecting you

lines.flavourText:
"A man confronted with sufficient adversity
may ascend to unprecedented heights
and triumph over his coddled rivals."
- Weylan the Ezomyte

lines.name: Bloodsoaked Medallion

explicitModifiers.text: (30-59)% increased Global Critical Strike Chance
+(50-70) to maximum Life
+(17-29)% to Chaos Resistance

Every 10 seconds:
Gain 2% of Life per Enemy Hit with Attacks for 5 seconds
Gain 5% of Life per Enemy Killed for 5 seconds

lines.flavourText:
"Atziri ordained that we exploit the weaknesses inherent in our slaves.
With relish, we did exactly as she instructed."
- Guatelitzi, Architect of Flesh

lines.name: Ceinture of Benevolence

explicitModifiers.text: +(20-40) to Dexterity
+(40-72) to maximum Mana
(7-10)% reduced Flask Charges used
Non-Unique Utility Flasks you Use apply to Linked Targets

lines.flavourText:
"Put your faith in me.
Our god demands it."
- High Templar Maxarius

lines.name: Tainted Pact

explicitModifiers.text: +(20-30) to Strength
(2-3.21)% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life
(1-1.5)% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Mana
Taking Chaos Damage over Time heals you instead while Leeching Life

lines.flavourText:
Beidat made false promises to many denizens,
converting only one into a conduit through
which Wraeclast might be consumed.

lines.name: Soulbound

explicitModifiers.text: +(10-20) to all Attributes
Link Skills have (10-15)% increased Cast Speed
Link Skills have (10-15)% increased Skill Effect Duration
Linked Targets Cannot Die for 2 seconds after you Die
Lose no Experience when you die because a Linked target died

lines.flavourText:
"Slay my twin and I will inherit her wisdom.
Slay me and her life will be prolonged by my demise.
Our souls are eternally bound by the sacrifices we have made."
- High Priest Atazek

lines.name: Ikiaho's Promise

explicitModifiers.text: Regenerate (3-5) Mana per second
(30-40)% increased Life Recovery from Flasks
(20-30)% increased Mana Recovery from Flasks
Life Flasks used while on Low Life apply Recovery Instantly
Mana Flasks used while on Low Mana apply Recovery Instantly

lines.flavourText: Even the loneliest of souls can aid a friend in times of darkness.

lines.name: Tawhanuku's Timing

explicitModifiers.text: (30-40)% increased Spell Damage
+(60-80) to maximum Mana
(5-10)% chance to Freeze, Shock and Ignite

Spells cause you to gain Energy Shield equal to their Upfront
Cost every fifth time you Pay it

lines.flavourText: The soul still beats, even when the heart never did.

lines.name: Bound Fate

explicitModifiers.text: +(20-30) to Dexterity
+(20-30) to Intelligence
+(60-80) to maximum Life

Every 5 seconds, gain one of the following for 5 seconds:
Your Hits are always Critical Strikes
Hits against you are always Critical Strikes
Attacks cannot Hit you
Attacks against you always Hit
Your Damage with Hits is Lucky
Damage of Hits against you is Lucky

lines.flavourText:
Knowing what will happen
and knowing when it will happen
are two very different things.

lines.name: Kaom's Binding

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: +(30-40) to Strength
+(300-500) to Armour
Take no Burning Damage if you've stopped taking Burning Damage Recently
Nearby Enemies Convert 25% of their Physical Damage to Fire

lines.flavourText:
For centuries, he burned in an unending
nightmare of lava and flame... but he endured.

lines.name: Night's Hold

implicitModifiers.text: Grants Level 23 Purity of Ice Skill
Grants Level 23 Purity of Lightning Skill
Grants Level 23 Purity of Fire Skill
Grants Level 21 Purity of Elements Skill
0.5% of Lightning Damage Leeched as Life
0.5% of Cold Damage Leeched as Life
(20-24)% increased Elemental Damage with Attack Skills
You can apply an additional Curse
0.5% of Fire Damage Leeched as Life

explicitModifiers.text: +2 to Level of Socketed Gems
Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 10 Added Chaos Damage
Socketed Gems are supported by Level 10 Blind
Socketed Gems are supported by Level 10 Cast when Stunned

lines.flavourText:
In the light of Solaris, the shadows cower and hide.
But every night they gather and grow,
and all but the strong and the stupid
seek shelter from their grasp until daybreak.
